unnormalised: I'm seeing a lot of "Is X location a good place to invest in real estate?" questions lately. Let me share my experience - I was also once in a similar boat, searching for the perfect property, and ended up buying a flat at 12, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, 400049.
normalised: I am seeing a lot of "Is X location a good place to invest in real estate?" questions lately. Let me share my experience - I was also once in a similar boat, searching for the perfect property, and ended up buying a flat at twelve, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, four hundred thousand and forty nine.

unnormalised: Initially, I was looking at properties closer to Bandra, around 33rd Road, but the prices were just too high – upwards of ₹5Cr for a decent 2BHK. A friend suggested I look at Juhu, specifically around the smaller lanes branching off from Juhu Tara Road. I found a slightly older building, but the flat was spacious (approx. 1200 sq ft) and the address was pretty central. It cost me Rs. 3.8 crores back in 2018.
normalised: Initially, I was looking at properties closer to Bandra, around thirty third Road, but the prices were just too high – upwards of rupee five crore for a decent two B-H-K. A friend suggested I look at Juhu, specifically around the smaller lanes branching off from Juhu Tara Road. I found a slightly older building, but the flat was spacious (approximately one thousand two hundred square feet) and the address was pretty central. It cost me rupees three point eight crore back in two thousand and eighteen.

unnormalised: The location has been fantastic. My office is at BKC, easily accessible via the Bandra-Worli Sea Link. Plus, living so close to the beach (about a 5-minute walk from the building at "Gulmohar Apartments, Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400049, India") is a major plus. Property taxes are around ₹45,000 per year. Would I recommend investing here? Absolutely!
normalised: The location has been fantastic. My office is at B-K-C, easily accessible via the Bandra-Worli Sea Link. Plus, living so close to the beach (about a five minute walk from the building at "Gulmohar Apartments, Juhu, Mumbai, Maharashtra four hundred thousand and forty nine, India") is a major plus.
